docs.snippet: While Ted Cruz decried "gutter politics" against him, former Republican presidential contenders gave him a boost Wednesday, casting the Texas senator as the party's last best chance to stop Donald Trump. The long and bitter 2016 campaign shifted t...
docs.lead_paragraph: While Ted Cruz decried "gutter politics" against him, former Republican presidential contenders gave him a boost Wednesday, casting the Texas senator as the party's last best chance to stop Donald Trump. The long and bitter 2016 campaign shifted to a new Midwestern battleground.

headline.main: Cruz Emboldened, but Needs a Near Miracle to Catch Trump

docs.abstract: Bombings in Brussels immediately exacerbate Europe's worries over migrant crisis and renew debate over how to respond to tide of refugees from Middle East and North Africa.
